about_the_game:
A virus that suddenly appears begins to delete all the software and imprison people's minds on the computer in a simulation world. To get rid of this virus, you must save the world by collecting all the passwords and restarting the system!

CONTROLS

WASD : Movement
SPACE: Jump
LEFT CTRL : Crouch
Run on wall: For walk on the wall, run towards the wall and jump. Then keep walking without taking your hand off the W.

We wish you a good time

You can contact us for reporting bugs and suggestions

name: Simulassword

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K (4 * 3300) AMD Phenom II X4 965 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2048 MB) / Radeon RX 550 (4096 MB)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K (4 * 3300) AMD Phenom II X4 965 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2048 MB) / Radeon RX 550 (4096 MB)

short_description: A virus that suddenly appears begins to delete all the software and imprison people's minds on the computer in a simulation world. To get rid of this virus, you must save the world by collecting all the passwords and restarting the system!
supported_languages:
English*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
